original_title: Bunker ou Contos que Ouvi Depois do Mundo Acabar
overview: In a world polluted by atomic radiation, five survivors find shelter in an underground bunker. The sudden discovery of a rare and miraculous medicine will become a source of quarrel within the group.

production_companies.name: Escola Superior de Teatro e Cinema

tagline: Don’t miss the train! With KB-LB, find bliss again!
title: Bunker or Tales I Heard When the World Fell
